text.section: The application of this article to a security interest in a secured obligation is not affected by the fact that the obligation is itself secured by a transaction or interest to which this article does not apply.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 1, effective April 2, 2002. -- Repealed and reenacted 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2001. -- Repealed and reenacted 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 29, effective July 1, 2001. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 478, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 9-109, effective July 1, 1960.
